actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the village of Mariemont, Ohio, a parcel of land referred to as the "Ohio River Division Laboratory of the Army Corps of Engineers", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to Mariemont, Ohio, specified real property referred to as the Ohio River Division Laboratory of the Army Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the village of Mariemont, Ohio, a parcel of land referred to as the "Ohio River Division Laboratory of the Army Corps of Engineers", and for other purposes.
